name: Dungeons, rats and boose
description:
Rats have invaded your house. They walk behind you.  They eat your food. They sleep on your bed.

Time to end this!
Beat those rats in the face!
Get your honor back!
Get your house back!
Get your life back!

But most importantly, don't be afraid.
After all, you are not the bravest man in the world.
Or...are you?

This is a small dungeon crawler . We made this game in a week for Dungeon Crawler Jam 2023 

Twitter Gamejolt VK
